ruleset.name: PHPUnitStandard - Testing
ruleset.description:
A coding standard for PHPUnit tests written and mainted by @elblinkin.
You will need to install an addition pear package in order to use these Sniffs! See: https://github.com/elblinkin/PHPUnit-CodeSniffer

rule.name: AllowedFunctionOverride
rule.description: Only a certain set of protected functions are allowed to be overriden

rule.name: ClassName
rule.description:
Class names should match the path within the unit test folder.
The folder is currently */tests/phpunit/* and this is not configurable so use only if that convention applies to your project.

rule.name: ExtraneousClass
rule.description:
Tests are expected to reside somewhere in */tests/phpunit/*.
This is not the official PHPUnit recommendation and for now the path is not configurable.

property.name: suffix
property.description: The suffix all PHPUnit test case files should have.

rule.name: NoInterfaces
rule.description: No Interfaces may be defined in test cases

rule.name: NoOutputFunctions
rule.description: Tests may not contain output functions

rule.name: NoOutputStatements
rule.description: Tests may not contain output statements

rule.name: NoPrivateMethods
rule.description: Tests may not have private helper methods. See: http://elblinkin.info/2011/11/an-example-avoid-private-functions-in-unit-tests/

rule.name: NoReflection
rule.description: Tests may not use reflection functionality.

rule.name: ProvenTestCase
rule.description:
Only the default set of PHPUnit test case classes may be used when extending.
You can't have your own base classes or you need to extend the test and whitelist them.

rule.name: TestOrProviderFunctionsOnly
rule.description: Test cases may only consist of test and data provider functions. No helper methods are allowed. See: http://elblinkin.info/2011/11/an-example-avoid-private-functions-in-unit-tests/

rule.name: TestOrProviderIsPublic
rule.description: Test cases and data providers have to be public. This allows you to find tests that wouldn't get executed by mistake.

rule.name: UnusedProvider
rule.description: Data providers must be used at least once. This allows you to find unused code.

rule.name: ValidFunctionName
rule.description: Test functions may only start with "test" or "provider" and contain one underscore at most and have to be camelCaps.
